import { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; function Add() { const [product, setproduct] = useState({}); const navigate = useNavigate(); return (
setproduct({ ...product, id: e.target.value })} />
setproduct({ ...product, name: e.target.value })} />
setproduct({ ...product, image: e.target.value })} />
setproduct({ ...product, price: e.target.value })} />
) } export default Add;
